price: 43. And verily, whosoever shows patience and forgives, that would truly be from the things recommended by Allâh.
arabic: وَلَمَن صَبَرَ وَغَفَرَ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمِنۡ عَزۡمِ ٱلۡأُمُورِ
